${ModID}:BeyondTheStars.NAME: Beyond the Stars
${ModID}:BeyondTheStars.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL 获得 a *Madness.
${ModID}:BeyondTheStars.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL 获得 a *Madness+.

${ModID}:NamelessMist.NAME: Nameless Mist
${ModID}:NamelessMist.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL 获得 another !M! 每当 you play a card 本回合.

${ModID}:FlailingTendril.NAME: Flailing Tendril
${ModID}:FlailingTendril.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Distortion to a random enemy.

${ModID}:PageOfTheDead.NAME: Page of the Dead
${ModID}:PageOfTheDead.DESCRIPTION: 获得 a *Necronomicurse. NL The next Attack you play that costs 2 or more is played twice.
${ModID}:PageOfTheDead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The next Attack you play that costs 2 or more is played twice.

${ModID}:FamilialCurse.NAME: Familial Curse
${ModID}:FamilialCurse.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! ${ModID}:Ruin to ALL enemies. NL Next turn, 获得 a *Madness and lose 1 生命.

${ModID}:GazeTheVoid.NAME: Gaze the Void
${ModID}:GazeTheVoid.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 !M! 次。 NL Enter ${ModID}:Nightmare.

${ModID}:AllSeeing.NAME: All Seeing
${ModID}:AllSeeing.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, Scry !M! and take 3 damage.

${ModID}:EndOfDays.NAME: End of Days
${ModID}:EndOfDays.DESCRIPTION: At end of turn, Channel a Dark for each [E] unspent.
${ModID}:EndOfDays.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得 !M! Focus. NL At end of turn, Channel a Dark for each [E] unspent.

${ModID}:RlyehFhtagn.NAME: R'lyeh Fhtagn
${ModID}:RlyehFhtagn.DESCRIPTION: Put EVERYONE to sleep. Next turn, 获得 3 *Madness and lose 3 生命. NL 消耗 。
${ModID}:RlyehFhtagn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put EVERYONE to sleep. Next turn, 获得 3 *Madness+ and lose 3 生命. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:StarSpawn.NAME: Star Spawn
${ModID}:StarSpawn.DESCRIPTION: Deal 13 damage twice. NL Heal !M! 生命. NL Channel a Plasma. NL 消耗 。
